Text:
Post from the site he links to:

Welcome to the International White federation. My name is R. James, former head of the Aryan Union, and current high-ranking member of the Aryan Brotherhood. I am ready to carry on where the former Aryan Union left off and use my skills, talents and connections on an international basis to carry on the struggle for white independence and survival of our worthy race! This Google group will operate within it's terms of service and will provide news and commentary of interest to white people. So, join us and join in the fun, yet serious mission to spread important news and views to our people!

A bit freaky, I say...

So what exactly is going on here then? A little hate-preaching perhaps? Is this guy desperate to "spread the true word". Why not have a cup of tea and a biscuit instead? You wont piss people of that way. loser

Golly gee, you've convinced me. So, how do we go about killing off the 90% or so of the world's population that you hate so much?

Fucking retard.
